title: MxPx Discography 1994-2012 (33 Releases)
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MXPX DISCOGRAPHY
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This MxPx discography is made up of the following 33 titles...

 * 1994 - 17 EP
 * 1994 - Pokinatcha
 * 1995 - On The Cover
 * 1995 - Teenage Politics
 * 1996 - Life In General
 * 1996 - Move To Bremerton EP
 * 1998 - Let It Happen
 * 1998 - Rares Tracks
 * 1998 - Slowly Going the Way of the Buffalo
 * 1999 - At The Show
 * 2000 - Coming Home For Christmas - Single
 * 2000 - Responsibility CDS
 * 2000 - The Broken Bones EP
 * 2000 - The Ever Passing Moment
 * 2001 - Fat Club 7 Inch
 * 2001 - The Renaissance EP
 * 2002 - B-Sides
 * 2002 - Ten Years And Running
 * 2003 - Before Everything And After
 * 2003 - Napster Acoustic Sessions
 * 2004 - Acoustic EP
 * 2004 - B-Movie
 * 2005 - Christmas Songs
 * 2005 - Panic
 * 2005 - Rarities And Bootlegs
 * 2006 - Let It Happen - Deluxe Edition
 * 2006 - Let's Rock
 * 2007 - Secret Weapon
 * 2008 - The Ultimate Collection
 * 2009 - Left Coast Punk EP
 * 2009 - On The Cover 2
 * 2009 - Punk Rawk Christmas - Green Edition
 * 2012 - Plans Within Plans

MxPx is a pop punk band from Bremerton, Washington with connections to the Christian punk scene. All the members of the band are Christians, and this is reflected in some of the band's songs. However, they prefer not to be called a Christian band. On the topic of their faith, Mike Herrera has been quoted saying "We are Christian. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not a cult or something. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s part of our story and I guess itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s different and controversial. But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a personal thing. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s what we choose to believe. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s all there is to it. We donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t preach to anyone."

God Bless,
TorrentTracts - July 2012
